name: Show Notification
description: Trigger toast/alert notifications in the UI. This is a streaming UI tool - notifications appear in real-time as the tool call streams through. Use this to communicate important updates, confirmations, errors, or actionable alerts to the user. Supports 4 severity levels (info/success/warning/error), customizable duration, action buttons, and positioning. Notifications can be persistent (duration: 0) or auto-dismiss. Action buttons can trigger prompts or dismiss. Use the 'title' for emphasis and 'message' for details.

duration.description: Auto-dismiss duration in milliseconds. Use 0 for persistent notifications that require manual dismiss. Default: 5000ms (5 seconds)

actions.description: Optional action buttons shown in notification

action.description: 'dismiss' closes notification, 'prompt' sends a prompt to chat

prompt.description: Prompt text to send when action='prompt'
